#summary 3rd party Guice addons

Things that build on Guice

  * *[http://gabriel.reposita.org/ Gabriel]* - A permission-based security framework from Stephan Schmidt.
  * *[http://www.wideplay.com/guicewebextensions Guice WebExtensions]* - New scopes for your web apps, @FlashScoped and @ConversationScoped
  * *[http://www.wideplay.com/wideplayinteractive::warp Warp]* - A component-based, event-driven web framework (a lightweight analog of Tapestry).

Integrations of Guice with other 3rd-party packages

  * *[http://dev.priorartisans.com/tim/dwr-guice/index.html DWR-Guice Integration]* - [http://tembrel.blogspot.com/2007/04/guice-support-in-dwr.html Tim Peierls integrated] Guice with [http://getahead.org/dwr DWR] (Direct Web Remoting).
  * *[http://www.wideplay.com/guicewebextensions2 Guice WebExtensions Persist]* and *[http://www.wideplay.com/dynamicfinders Dynamic Finders]* - make Guice and Hibernate/JPA like each other

Other

  * *[http://code.google.com/p/titan-ioc/ Titan]* is like "Guice for .NET"
